sourcesContent:
function MatchStats(props) { const matchData = props.matchData const homeTextColor = matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.teamColors?.fontDarkMode?.home const homeBgColor = matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.teamColors?.darkMode?.home const awayTextColor = matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.teamColors?.fontDarkMode?.away const awayBgColor = matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.teamColors?.darkMode?.away console.log(matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0].stats) return (
Top Stats
{matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[0]?.title}
{matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[0]}%
{matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[0]}%
{matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.map((stat, index) => (
stat.stats?.[1] ? homeTextColor : "", backgroundColor: stat.stats?.[0] > stat.stats?.[1] ? homeBgColor : "" }} className="text-base rounded-full text-center py-1 px-3"> {stat.stats?.[0]}
{stat.title}
stat.stats?.[0] ? awayTextColor : "", backgroundColor: stat.stats?.[1] > stat.stats?.[0] ? awayBgColor : "" }} className="text-base rounded-full text-center py-1 px-3"> {stat.stats?.[1]}
))} {/*
matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[1] ? homeTextColor : "", backgroundColor: matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[0] > matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[1] ? homeBgColor : "" }} className="text-base rounded-full text-center py-1 px-3"> {matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[0]}
{matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.title}
matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[0] ? awayTextColor : "", backgroundColor: matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[1] > matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[0] ? awayBgColor : "" }} className="text-base rounded-full text-center py-1 px-3"> {matchData?.content?.stats?.Periods?.All?.stats?.[0]?.stats?.[1]?.stats?.[1]}
*/}
) } export default MatchStats
